CDISC Notes: DM.SUBJID. SUBJID is required in ADSL, but permissible in other datasets.
DM.SITEID. SITEID is required in ADSL, but permissible in other datasets.

Character description of a grouping or pooling of clinical sites for analysis purposes. For example, SITEGR3 is the name of a variable containing site group (pooled site) names, where the grouping has been done according to the third site grouping algorithm, defined in variable metadata; SITEGR3 does not mean the third group of sites.
The numeric code for SITEGRy. One-to-one mapping to SITEGRy within a study.

Character description of geographical region. For example, REGION1 might have values of ‘Asia’,
‘Europe’, ‘North America’, ‘Rest of World’; REGION2 might have values of ‘United States’, ‘Rest of World’.

The numeric code for REGIONy. Orders REGIONy for analysis and reporting. One-to-one
mapping to REGIONy within a study.
